title: The One With Rachel's New Dress

questions.question: What object is Phoebe carrying when she enters Central Perk?
options: A guitar
A drum
A cookbook
A baby carrier
questions.correct_answer: A drum
questions.explanation: Phoebe enters Central Perk carrying a drum, which she claims is because her guitar no longer fits due to her pregnancy.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe want to name one of the babies after someone she loves?
options: Because it's a family tradition
Because she wants to honor that person
Because she thinks it will bring good luck
Because she loves the sound of the name
questions.correct_answer: Because she wants to honor that person
questions.explanation: Phoebe wants to name one of the babies after someone she loves, which is why she considers naming him Joey or Chandler.

questions.question: What is the name of the dish Rachel is making for Joshua?
options: Frieze salad with goat cheese and pine nuts
Filet mignon
Salmon au croup
Chicken parmesan
questions.correct_answer: Frieze salad with goat cheese and pine nuts
questions.explanation: Rachel is making a frieze salad with goat cheese and pine nuts for her dinner date with Joshua.

questions.question: What is Joshua's unusual fear?
options: Fear of heights
Fear of spiders
Fear of farm birds
Fear of enclosed spaces
questions.correct_answer: Fear of farm birds
questions.explanation: Joshua has an unusual fear of farm birds, which causes him to become uncomfortable around Rachel's pet chicken and duck.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's paranoia about Emily and Susan?
options: He thinks Emily is hiding something from him
He thinks Susan is trying to steal Emily away from him
He thinks Emily and Susan are having an affair
He thinks Carol is trying to sabotage his relationship with Emily
questions.correct_answer: He thinks Emily and Susan are having an affair
questions.explanation: Ross is paranoid that Emily and Susan might be having an affair, which is fueled by his past experience with Carol and her relationship with Susan.

questions.question: What is the name that Phoebe finally decides to give to one of the babies?
options: Joey
Chandler
Ross
The Hulk
questions.correct_answer: Chandler
questions.explanation: Phoebe decides to name one of the babies Chandler, after her friend Chandler Bing.

questions.question: Why does Chandler want to change his name?
options: He thinks it will bring him good luck
He thinks it will improve his relationships
He thinks it will help him in his career
He thinks it will make him more attractive to women
questions.correct_answer: He thinks it will improve his relationships
questions.explanation: Chandler wants to change his name because he thinks it will improve his relationships and help him to do better with women.

questions.question: What is the name that Chandler considers changing his name to?
options: Mark Johnson
John Markson
Clint
Gene
questions.correct_answer: Mark Johnson or John Markson
questions.explanation: Chandler considers changing his name to either Mark Johnson or John Markson.

questions.question: Why does Ross think Emily and Susan might be having an affair?
options: Because they are spending too much time together
Because they are being too friendly with each other
Because he thinks Emily is secretly a lesbian
Because he thinks Susan is trying to sabotage his relationship with Emily
questions.correct_answer: Because they are spending too much time together
questions.explanation: Ross thinks Emily and Susan might be having an affair because they are spending too much time together, which reminds him of his past experience with Carol and Susan.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Rachel's dinner date with Joshua?
options: They have a romantic evening and kiss
They have a nice time but don't kiss
They have an argument and don't see each other again
They are interrupted by Joshua's parents and have to leave
questions.correct_answer: They are interrupted by Joshua's parents and have to leave
questions.explanation: Rachel's dinner date with Joshua is interrupted by his parents, who come home unexpectedly and catch Rachel wearing a lace nightie.

questions.question: What does Phoebe use to play her songs while she is pregnant?
options: A guitar
A drum
A piano
A harmonica
questions.correct_answer: A drum
questions.explanation: Phoebe uses a drum to play her songs while she is pregnant, because her guitar no longer fits due to her pregnancy.

questions.question: Why does Ross get jealous when he thinks about Emily and Susan together?
options: Because he thinks Emily is attracted to Susan
Because he thinks Susan is trying to steal Emily away from him
Because he thinks Emily and Susan are having an affair
Because he has trust issues due to his past experience with Carol
questions.correct_answer: Because he has trust issues due to his past experience with Carol
questions.explanation: Ross gets jealous when he thinks about Emily and Susan together because he has trust issues due to his past experience with Carol, who left him for Susan.

questions.question: What is the reason for Chandler's joke about his name being 'ridiculous'?
options: He thinks his name is too common
He thinks his name is too unusual
He thinks his name is not masculine enough
He thinks his name is holding him back in life
questions.correct_answer: He thinks his name is holding him back in life
questions.explanation: Chandler jokes that his name is 'ridiculous' because he thinks it is holding him back in life, particularly in his relationships with women.

questions.question: What is the name that Joey suggests for Phoebe's baby?
options: Joey
Chandler
Ross
The Hulk
questions.correct_answer: Joey
questions.explanation: Joey suggests that Phoebe name her baby after him, saying 'Joey's your pal, Joey's your buddy'.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe decide to name her baby Chandler?
options: Because she thinks it's a strong and confident name
Because she wants to honor Chandler
Because she thinks it will bring good luck
Because she wants to make Chandler happy
questions.correct_answer: Because she wants to honor Chandler
questions.explanation: Phoebe decides to name her baby Chandler because she wants to honor him, after he considers changing his own name.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's comment about 'no tongue'?
options: He is joking about Emily and Susan's relationship
He is relieved that Emily and Susan are not kissing
He is commenting on the food they are eating
He is making a joke about his own relationship with Emily
questions.correct_answer: He is relieved that Emily and Susan are not kissing
questions.explanation: Ross comments 'no tongue' because he is relieved that Emily and Susan are not kissing, which suggests a romantic or intimate relationship.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Chandler's consideration to change his name?
options: He decides to change his name to Mark Johnson
He decides to change his name to John Markson
He decides not to change his name
He decides to change his name to Clint
questions.correct_answer: He decides not to change his name
questions.explanation: Chandler decides not to change his name after Phoebe decides to name her baby after him, which makes him realize that his name is not so bad after all.

questions.question: What is the reason for Joshua's parents' early return from their trip?
options: They forgot something at home
They got bored with their trip
They cut their trip short
They were unhappy with their accommodations
questions.correct_answer: They cut their trip short
questions.explanation: Joshua's parents return early from their trip because they cut it short, which interrupts Joshua's romantic evening with Rachel.

questions.question: What is the name that Chandler temporarily considers as his new name?
options: Clint
Gene
Mark
John
questions.correct_answer: Clint
questions.explanation: Chandler temporarily considers 'Clint' as his new name, but Joey teases him that he is not cool enough to pull it off.

questions.question: What is the reason for Rachel's embarrassing situation at Joshua's parents' house?
options: She wears a revealing outfit
She says something inappropriate
She breaks something valuable
She meets Joshua's ex-girlfriend
questions.correct_answer: She wears a revealing outfit
questions.explanation: Rachel's embarrassing situation at Joshua's parents' house occurs when she wears a revealing lace nightie, which his parents see when they unexpectedly return home.

questions.question: What is the advice that Monica and the others give to Ross about his paranoia?
options: To trust Emily and not be jealous
To confront Emily about his suspicions
To give Emily space and time
To break up with Emily
questions.correct_answer: To trust Emily and not be jealous
questions.explanation: Monica and the others advise Ross to trust Emily and not be jealous, suggesting that his paranoia is unfounded and may be a result of his past experiences.
